requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD Athlon™ 64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 4400 or more, Radeon HD graphics 5430 or more, OpenGL 3.0 or more
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
